titleStmt.title: Rowland Y. Vories to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2551

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: I Rowland Y Vories a Justice of the Peace in and for Carroll County do hereby tender this my resignation of said office of Justice of the Peace to His Excellency the Governor of the State of Kentucky

We would respectfully recommend William ^Washington^ Murphy as a suitable person to fill the vacancy in the office of Justice of the Peace created by the resignation of Rowland Y Vories in District No 5 Carroll County

H Cox Judge County Court
R. Y. Vories
A W Darling
A. J. Guthrie
Jno R Vance clerk

Carroll Co
J. P.
Dist No 5
Issd Sept 20. 1861
